http://www.reactiongifs.us/wp-content/uploads/2013/08/give_it_to_me_stephen_colbert.gif

Amazing skin concept, really hope to see a full 5 offers. Even more excited to draft them myself:

Fullback Sion - I know it says linebacker, but he's carrying the ball, and his ulti is really more in-line with a lead blocker

Quarterback - Xerath: hailmary ultimates for days

Kicker - Lee Sin: think about it, so much pressure on Lee to have a good kick, and usually its so easy, but sometimes it can go so, so wrong

Defensive End/Tackle - Gragas (or OT but I've already suggested 2 offensive positions, and Gragas has to be on this list)

Linebacker Illaoi - Football is for women too, and no female on the Rift hits harder than this warrior
I played linebacker through high school and college, and I gotta say {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

I kind of want SPORTMASTER SION, instead.

Change his costume with a cartoony twirl (you know, how some cartoons spin in place when changing clothes) when he does his skills so:
Q - doing a slow dunk into a hoop or something similar
W - the various balls orbiting him or something like that.
E - Bowling, or Golf
R - Linebacker as you said.
Strong-Side Sion
